resources.string: This app will display your name, place of study and the validity of your digital student card. The app will display a photo of you if you choose to select one. The app will function as a student card and can be used as identification for services your place of study has an agreement with. First time usage requires you to be connected to WiFi or a cellular connection to download the information required to display the student card. This information will be stored locally on the app. KortFri does not take any responsibility for tickets, abuse or any usage that violates Norwegian or international laws. The photos uploaded on this app will be deleted from our database once you as a user are deleted from our systems. Users with admin-rights to the KortFri system have the possibility to delete users. Usually this will be the IT-responsible at? your place of study.
Are you 15 or older, and do you accept our terms of use?
The card will be valid for one semester at a time before it has to get updated, the spring semester reaches from 01.01-31.07 and the fall semester from 01.08-31.12.
Contact IT support to get yur code
You have already picked a photo
You are admin, use the web app
Click the "I accept" box to use the app

You have to type in a code to change your profile picture. Your teacher or system administrator will give you this code. IMPORTANT INFORMATION: You can only use this code once! After using the code, only the system administrator can alter your profile picture. This is because the app is used as identification. Remember that using the identity of another person is illegal. (for example: Use your friends app to get a lower priced buss ticket.)
Use a phone number to authenticate with Firebase.
STOP! If you are not pleased with the way the picture looks, go back and change it.
